verses.text: The earth \add is\add* the \sc Lordâ€™s\sc*, and the fulness thereof; The world, and they that dwell therein.
For he hath founded it upon the seas, And established it upon the floods.
Who shall ascend into the hill of the \sc Lord\sc*? And who shall stand in his holy place?
He that hath clean hands, and a pure heart; Who hath not lift up his soul unto vanity, Nor sworn deceitfully.
He shall receive the blessing from the \sc Lord\sc*, And righteousness from the God of his salvation.
This \add is\add* the generation of them that seek him, That seek thy face, O Jacob. Selah.
Lift up your heads, O ye gates; And be ye lift up, ye everlasting doors; And the King of glory shall come in.
Who \add is\add* this King of glory? The \sc Lord\sc* strong and mighty, The \sc Lord\sc* mighty \add in\add* battle.
Lift up your heads, O ye gates; Even lift \add them\add* up, ye everlasting doors; And the King of glory shall come in.
Who is this King of glory? The \sc Lord\sc* of hosts, he \add is\add* the King of glory. Selah.
